to make room for co-founder Larry Page. Eric Schmidt will move into an Executive Chairman role. But why? And what does it mean for you? According to Eric Schmidt : Larry will now lead product development and technology strategy, his greatest strengths, and starting from April 4 he will take charge of our day-to-day operations as Google's Chief Executive Officer. In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly. The third leg of the triumvirate, Sergey Brin , will take the title of Co-Founder, focusing on new products. - Sirius XM shock jock Howard Stern ripped into Jay Leno , accusing him of stealing material for "The Tonight Show," in an interview scheduled to air Tuesday night, the New York Post reported Monday. Jay Leno is insane. And Jay Leno is a crook. And the world knows exactly what he's up to. He steals a tremendous amount of material, Howard Stern said in an interview for CNN's " Piers Morgan Tonight."
